definition: owner/master/host/individual or party concerned/God/Lord/main/to indicate or signify/trump card (in card games)

sentences.english: Hezbollah fought a 34-day war with Israel in 2006.
sentences.chinese: 真主黨在2006年的時候跟以色列交火34天。

sentences.english: And Hezbollah and Israel have fought against each other in the past.
sentences.chinese: 而在過去真主黨和以色列曾經兵戎相見。

sentences.english: When Hezbollah and its erstwhile foes exchange kisses, a befuddled Condoleezza Rice should take care not to fall off her exercise bicycle.
sentences.chinese: 當真主黨和昔日的敵人交換親吻，賴斯會感到迷惑。
